userInterface

Class CmdMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • userInterface.CmdMain

  • public class CmdMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for running the command line version CmdMain holds an array of command line arguments and processes them to run the standard functions of the application.

        Handles the flags passed by the command line. Public for testing purposes
        Parameters:
        version - Flag set to display version
        help - Flag set to display help
        answers - Flag set to display correct answers on PolyLearn files
        Returns:
        Concatenated string of the output
